attributes.action: Force British Gas to remove the word British fron their company name.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand that the Prime Minister whoever they may be, insist that British Gas remove the word British from the company name. This company are so inept in every area of business other than collecting money that they are a disgrace to the name, and do not represent Great Britain.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
